author: Nik Shenoy
title: Vice President of Software Development
quote: Some of Jacques' work can feel uncomfortable at first, but that’s often because he’s operating a bit ahead of where the team is — and helping us see where we need to go

author: Jennifer Wright
title: Strategic Professional Services Leader
quote: If Jacques doubts whether he belongs in the room, that's often the clearest sign he's in the right place — tackling the messy, undefined work that matters.

author: Jessie Chang
title: Operations Manager, Product & Design Services
quote: Jacques wowed the team with an outstanding presentation—conveying complex concepts with clarity, confidence, and his signature composed demeanor. His representation of Orium's excellence before a sizable audience was exceptional.

author: Abeiene Nejar
title: Founder, Head of Research & Strategy
quote: Jacques excelled in every aspect—from impeccable design to adept leadership. He navigated client interactions with finesse, managed the project like a seasoned pro, and provided unwavering team support. A stroke of luck as a partner!

author: Leigh Bryant
title: Director, Brand and Content
quote: Jacques is our invaluable Swiss Army knife—seamlessly stepping up to any challenge with expertise and a can-do attitude. His cross-functional skills and boundless energy elevate the entire team, and he thrives even in chaos.
